item.title: Word2vec
item.description: Word2vec is a word embedding model that learns the probability of some words being neighbours in a sentence $p_{neighbours}(w_i, w_o)$. Build a dataset of adjacent words. CBOW; skipgram; negative sampling; Encode the words using vectors. Build a model $f(\{\theta_i\})$ to calculate the probability of the words being neighours and improve the parameters $\{\theta_i\}$ using the dataset.
